column1: If you answer a craigslist advertisement for paid-attendees and you get Coronavirus while at the rally, can you claim worker's comp?
Can we use the same advice for the handling of the #coronavirus ?

Do we have 30 years?  I thought I read somewhere that the next 18 months would make or break us.

So we have Climate Disaster, CoronaVirus and trump all staring us down in the next 12 months.

Great.
